alert.note: Alert for Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 13 at 12:08AM MDT until April 14 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WARNING HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible on Wednesday. * WHERE...The Southern Meade County Plains and the Pennington County Plains. * WHEN...From 9 AM MDT this morning through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...The high winds could blow down large trees and damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains
